document_data.mainbody:
tienne was a mage who worked aboard the Crane during the mid-to-late 15 century DR.
Some time after the , Etienne joined the sailors of the Crane as part of its crew. She became romantically linked with the ships captain, Harp Levesque, in a tryst that ended poorly. Under some unknown circumstances, Etienne left the ship in tears, never to sail with them agian. According to crewman Boult, she was "chased off" by Captain Harp.
